languages.text: {n}Губернатор еле лепечет от ужаса.{/n} "Я... никогда... не думал..." {n}Переведя дух, он выдавливает.{/n} "Виновные. Конечно. Мы казним виновных, немедленно, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}".

traits.locale_text: "Нападение на Вольного Торговца — в моей же крепости, вот что! Позор, позор на мои седины!" {n}Двор пристыженно замолкает.{/n} "Похоже, сегодня нам предстоит экстерминировать еще и коменданта — за эту немыслимую халатность, как совершенно точно заметил господин судья!"

languages.text: {n}The governor babbles in fear,{/n} "I... I never... thought..." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "The culprits. Of course. The culprits will face execution post-haste, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор еле лепечет от ужаса.{/n} "Я... никогда... не думал..." {n}Переведя дух, он выдавливает.{/n} "Виновные. Конечно. Мы казним виновных, немедленно, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}".

{n}The governor babbles in fear,{/n} "I... I never... thought..." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "The culprits. Of course. The culprits will face execution post-haste, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

"An attack on the Rogue Trader, and in my own fortress! Disgrace, disgrace upon my grey head! It seems that today we are to execute the commander as well — for this unthinkable negligence, as the esteemed judge has quite rightly pointed out!"
{n}The governor babbles in fear,{/n} "I... I never... thought..." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "The culprits. Of course. The culprits will face execution post-haste, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."
{n}The governor babbles in fear,{/n} "I... I never... thought..." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "The culprits. Of course. The culprits will face execution post-haste, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."
{n}The governor babbles in fear,{/n} "I... I never... thought..." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "The culprits. Of course. The culprits will face execution post-haste, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."
{n}The governor babbles in fear,{/n} "I... I never... thought..." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "The culprits. Of course. The culprits will face execution post-haste, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

languages.text: {n}总督战战兢兢地开了口。{/n}“我……我从来没……打算……”{n}他深吸了一口气。{/n}“那些罪魁祸首，没错，那些罪魁祸首。我会把那些犯人处以极刑，来自上界的大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor babbles in fear,{/n} "I... I never... thought..." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "The culprits. Of course. The culprits will face execution post-haste, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}总督战战兢兢地开了口。{/n}“我……我从来没……打算……”{n}他深吸了一口气。{/n}“那些罪魁祸首，没错，那些罪魁祸首。我会把那些犯人处以极刑，来自上界的大人。”

languages.text: {n}El gobernador farfulla presa del pánico:{/n} «Yo... nunca... pensé que...». {n}Hace una pausa e inspira profundamente.{/n} «Los culpables. Por supuesto. Los culpables serán ejecutados sumariamente, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor babbles in fear,{/n} "I... I never... thought..." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "The culprits. Of course. The culprits will face execution post-haste, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador farfulla presa del pánico:{/n} «Yo... nunca... pensé que...». {n}Hace una pausa e inspira profundamente.{/n} «Los culpables. Por supuesto. Los culpables serán ejecutados sumariamente, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial».

languages.text: {n}Vali korkuyla geveliyor.{/n} "Ben... Ben asla... Böyle olacağını..." {n}Derin bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Suçlular. Elbette. Suçlular derhâl infazla yüzleşecek Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor babbles in fear,{/n} "I... I never... thought..." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "The culprits. Of course. The culprits will face execution post-haste, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali korkuyla geveliyor.{/n} "Ben... Ben asla... Böyle olacağını..." {n}Derin bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Suçlular. Elbette. Suçlular derhâl infazla yüzleşecek Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}."

languages.text: {n}総督は恐怖でわめく。{/n}「考えたこともありません…」{n}彼は深呼吸をする。{/n}「容疑者。もちろん。天の{mf|君|姫}、容疑者はすぐに処刑します」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor babbles in fear,{/n} "I... I never... thought..." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "The culprits. Of course. The culprits will face execution post-haste, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}総督は恐怖でわめく。{/n}「考えたこともありません…」{n}彼は深呼吸をする。{/n}「容疑者。もちろん。天の{mf|君|姫}、容疑者はすぐに処刑します」

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur se met à bafouiller sous l'effet de la peur :{/n} « Je... je n'ai jamais... » {n}Il prend une profonde inspiration.{/n} « Les coupables. Bien sûr. Les coupables vont être exécutés séance tenante, Votre Céleste Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor babbles in fear,{/n} "I... I never... thought..." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "The culprits. Of course. The culprits will face execution post-haste, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur se met à bafouiller sous l'effet de la peur :{/n} « Je... je n'ai jamais... » {n}Il prend une profonde inspiration.{/n} « Les coupables. Bien sûr. Les coupables vont être exécutés séance tenante, Votre Céleste Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur stammelt verängstigt:{/n} "Ich ... "Ich dachte ... nicht ..." {n}Er atmet tief durch.{/n} "Die Schuldigen. Natürlich. Die Schuldigen werden augenblicklich hingerichtet, {mf|himmlischer Herr|himmlische Herrin}."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor babbles in fear,{/n} "I... I never... thought..." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "The culprits. Of course. The culprits will face execution post-haste, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."
